# Sound assets

Add MP3 or OGG files for music and SFX. The app works without them (graceful fallback).

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `music-night.mp3` | Mystical night forest, ambient tension (loop) |
| `music-day.mp3` | Calmer day variant (loop) |
| `sfx-night-fall.mp3` | Low rumble, wind |
| `sfx-day-break.mp3` | Birds, dawn chord |
| `sfx-wolf-howls.mp3` | Wolf howl |
| `sfx-death.mp3` | Somber tone |
| `sfx-vote.mp3` | Drum beat |
| `sfx-witch-potion.mp3` | Bubbling, magical |
| `sfx-seer-chime.mp3` | Crystal / chime |

Sources: [Freesound](https://freesound.org), [Pixabay Music](https://pixabay.com/music/), or similar free libraries.
